WorkItem.ClosedComment: You're free to declare the function yourself if you'd rather use it globally. To reduce noise, not everything on window is exposed at top-level.
WorkItem.Description:
Current lib.d.ts declares setImmediate function on WindowTimersExtension but it does not have global setImmediate declaration.

Users cannot use setImmediate directly but rather use window.setImmediate.

Comments.Message: This is because `setImmediate` is not standard. It's supported only by IE.
Then I think TS should not support setImmediate, but it does anyway.
